title: you have been disconnected
body:
so i've been having this problem for about a week now, i can't play matches any more , so there it is i get through champ select then i get 0% in the loading screen followed by an error message " you have been disconnected , please check your internet connection" , and when i try to reconnect it gives me the same error over and over again without even getting to the loading screen then when i try to reconnect when the match actually starts it gives me 0% in the loading screen again and the same error, i've tried to reinstall the game, tried to repair it, tried different router,nothing works , my match history be like : -leave 
                                                       -leave
                                                       -leave 
                                                        -leave
and i haven't found a solution to this problem yet, some say to open the league of legends website before joining a game but that doesn't work also.

replies.body:
Network Disconnection errors after champ select are typically caused by your client dropping connection due to conflicting local network settings. I recommend you work through our list of common solutions inside our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps changed anything.
